# PS4 Bloodborne

`CUSA00207.savepatch`

### 1. Untested - Make sure to backup your save data first
### 2. Max Blood Stone Shard (Must Have 1 in inventory or Storage)

Target File: `userdata00*`

```
80010004 B80B0040
18000004 000003E7
80020004 B80B0040
18000004 000003E7
```
